messages.title: My first act as PRIME MINISTER will be to STOP BREXIT
A Lib Dem government for a brighter future

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Britain needs fresh vision and leadership for an exciting future. It’s a national disgrace when jobs don’t pay enough to put food on the table. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.

Our planet is at a breaking point. We don’t have the luxury of waiting another decade for the politicians to act. The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent action needed to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technology.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: INVEST IN SCHOOLS AND OUR NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will invest billions more to secure the future of the NHS after years of Conservative neglect. As Prime Minister, Jo Swinson will work every day to ensure our children get to go to the best schools in the world. They deserve nothing less.

mentions.tacticalSituation:
People are switching to a better future with Jo Swinson and the Lib Dems
Beating Labour and the Conservatives in the European Elections, New MPs joining the Lib Dems from both Labour and the Conservatives

quotes.text: The Lib Dem fightback is real - and it's changing everything

images.caption: Helping hand by the Liberal Democrats to various sectors

examples:
Gaining 700+ new councillors in the local elections
Record-high membership, 40,000 people have joined in recent months.
Beating Labour and the Conservatives in the European Elections
New MPs joining from both Labour and the Conservatives

Britain needs fresh vision and leadership for an exciting future. It’s a national disgrace when jobs don’t pay enough to put food on the table. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.

Our planet is at a breaking point. We don’t have the luxury of waiting another decade for the politicians to act. The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent action needed to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technology.

INVEST IN SCHOOLS AND OUR NHS: The Liberal Democrats will invest billions more to secure the future of the NHS after years of Conservative neglect. As Prime Minister, Jo Swinson will work every day to ensure our children get to go to the best schools in the world. They deserve nothing less.
The Liberal Democrats will invest billions more to secure the future of the NHS after years of Conservative neglect.
People don’t have to choose between Boris Johnson and Jeremy Corbyn.
Beating Labour and the Conservatives in the European Elections
